sense.def:
Z izrazom
whichever
povemo, da ni pomembno, katera od več možnosti se zgodi ali je izbrana.

seg.quote: The United States would be safe whichever side won.
Then they have lunch, have a chat, have a sleep, whichever they like, up in the lounge.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
whichever
tudi določimo, katera od večjega števila možnosti je prava ali tista, na katero mislimo.

seg.quote: Use whichever soap powder is recommended by the manufacturer.
Use whichever of the forms is appropriate.
